data.text: @shaunkrish @itsmebhuvans @morb_d Kerala is the best state in India across most parameters, that’s it. I don’t waste time with WhatsApp kids. Take it & leave. https://t.co/k0KifHGO25
@shaunkrish @comradarjun @morb_d Talk about famine? Your own Wikipedia says this https://t.co/YT6IWM74pf

@itsmebhuvans @comradarjun @morb_d By voting left, you will end up like the Soviet Russia of 1920s, 30s... famines & rations will make sure 90% of the state residents will be forced to flee elsewhere. Enjoy your commy free ration in queues.

@shaunkrish @itsmebhuvans @morb_d We send billions back home. The best business house in UAE is owned by Keralites. If there is no work in Kerala then why do 3.4 million people from north come to Kerala for their livelihood? https://t.co/al7FrcC0jf

@itsmebhuvans @comradarjun @morb_d If pages such as wiki are anything to go by, Kerala men are forced to work for the Gulf due to the incompetent, corruption ridden commy governments that have infested its economy like a virus https://t.co/NIu1oBq3il

@comradarjun @itsmebhuvans @morb_d Again a fake, time-disapproved headline. No wonder you are popping up with these. Check with your neighbours if you live in Kerala. Every household, i.e. 25% of entire 'Malayali' populace is based out of Arab/Gulf. This is a disgrace.

@shaunkrish @comradarjun @morb_d And how is that bad? Foreign exchange is good for our economy, and also how is migrant labourers coming to Kerala by the tens of thousands if there's employment elsewhere? And we are living here happily without worrying about getting killed because we ate beef
@shaunkrish @itsmebhuvans @morb_d Ok, bring your next lie. https://t.co/QV8TAFnV2J

@itsmebhuvans @comradarjun @morb_d Look, I don't need to prove it to you, you can see it yourselves if you take your commy gloves off. Your state residents work like slaves in the gulf, which I witness each day. They won't have to migrate offshore, if your state is any good or bothered.
@shaunkrish @comradarjun @morb_d If you can prove that we are anything worse than UP, I'll go to hell for you
@itsmebhuvans @comradarjun @morb_d Keep blabbering you commy agenda. Reds like you should go to live in China, you don't belong here

@shaunkrish @comradarjun @morb_d Low in vaccine coverage?😂 Open your eyes and look at the data. Also, we topped the SDG index this year, most literate state, one of the least hungry states next to only Punjab, best palliative care, , and most importantly, we don't kill people because of beef

@shaunkrish @comradarjun @morb_d Can't trust the government because modi said the war will be won in 21 days and we still haven't. And this communist infested state you're talking about is the best in India in almost all human wellness indices. So yeah, have some coronil and chill.
@shaunkrish @comradarjun Sir, have some coronil and chill.
@comradarjun @morb_d Why does the global approval matter here? Why can't you trust your own government? Just 'coz you are from in a communist infested land, have you lost your senses?
